arts.ttl: KNVB Cup: AZ defeat Ajax as
arts.sum: Below is a round-up of Tuesday’s KNVB Cup action. AZ Alkmaar 2-0 Ajax AZ Alkmaar dumped Ajax out of the cup thanks to goals from Wouter Goes and Mexx Meerdink. AZ went into the game without Mayckel Lahdo and Ruben van Bommel, meaning Jayden Addai and Ernest Poku started. arts.ttl: Roma Put Pedal to the Metal to Snap Up Ajax Starlet
arts.sum: Roma have reignited their pursuit of Devyne Rensch, whom they have been chasing for a while. His contract expires at the end of the season and he isn’t keen on renewing it. Ajax have been trying for about a year. The post Roma Put Pedal to the Metal to Snap Up Ajax Starlet appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Roma Reach Agreement with Rensch, Negotiations with Ajax Ongoing
arts.sum: Roma have reportedly reached a personal agreement with Ajax defender Devyne Rensch, setting the stage for a potential transfer in the January window. According to recent reports from Gazzetta dello Sport, the Giallorossi have agreed terms with the 21-year-old Dutch international on a contract that would keep him at the Stadio Olimpico until 2029. The post Roma Reach Agreement with Rensch, Negotiations with Ajax Ongoing appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: January transfer news and rumours: Elye Wahi to West Ham, Devyne Rensch to Everton, Leipzig to cancel Noah Okafor deal
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest transfer news and rumours, including Elye Wahi to West Ham, Devyne Rensch to Everton, and an update on Noah Okafor.

arts.ttl: “We believe in him”: Ajax director Alex Kroes has high hopes for latest prospect
arts.sum: As per VoetbalPrimeur's coverage of Ziggo Sport's 'Rondo', Ajax director Alex Kroes has confidence in Sean Steur (17).

arts.ttl: Rensch agrees personal terms with Roma as Ajax talks ongoing
arts.sum: Devyne Rensch has reportedly reached an agreement with Roma, but Ajax rejected the Giallorossi’s opening...

arts.ttl: OH Leuven sign AZ’s Lequincio Zeefuik on loan
arts.sum: AZ Alkmaar striker Lequincio Zeefuik (20) has joined OH Leuven in a loan-to-buy move, as per Voetbal International.

arts.ttl: Ajax director speaks out as Everton work to sign defender from Netherlands giants
arts.sum: Everton are among the clubs chasing Ajax’s Devyne Rensch, according to a report from the Netherlands. The right-back’s deal expires in the summer and he’s made 24 appearances in all competitions so far this season. The 21-year-old’s profile, performances and contract situation have seen him attract interest from Everton and several other clubs. arts.ttl: Roma to increase offer for Ajax’s Devyne Rensch
arts.sum: Serie A side Roma are keen to sign Ajax’s Devyne Rensch are all but set to increase their offer for the Dutchman. The 21-year-old’s current contract at Ajax runs out…

arts.ttl: Roma Eye Ajax’s Rensch: Negotiations Underway
arts.sum: Roma have set their sights on Ajax's promising young defender Devyne Rensch, with initial contacts already established between the two clubs. The 21-year-old Dutch right-back has caught the attention of the Giallorossi as they look to bolster their defensive options.
